Title: Compliance with Intellectual Property Rights
Creator Spotlight: The platform should ensure that all content shared and used by creators complies with intellectual property rights, including copyright and trademark laws.

Title: Data Privacy and Consent
Creator Spotlight: The platform should comply with data privacy regulations, ensuring that user data is collected, stored, and processed with proper consent and in accordance with applicable laws.

Title: Transparency in Sponsorship Deals
Creator Spotlight: The platform should provide transparency in sponsorship deals, disclosing the terms, conditions, and compensation involved to maintain trust and comply with advertising and influencer marketing regulations.

Title: Age Verification for Minors
Creator Spotlight: If the platform allows creators under a certain age to participate, it should implement age verification mechanisms to comply with child protection laws and regulations.

Title: Compliance with FTC Guidelines
Creator Spotlight: The platform should ensure that creators and brands comply with the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) guidelines for disclosure and transparency in sponsored content and endorsements.

Title: Secure User Authentication
Creator Spotlight: The platform should implement secure user authentication mechanisms, such as strong password policies, multi-factor authentication, and protection against brute-force attacks, to ensure that only authorized users can access the system.

Title: Data Encryption
Creator Spotlight: Sensitive user data, such as personal information and payment details, should be encrypted both at rest and in transit to protect against unauthorized access and data breaches.

Title: Access Control
Creator Spotlight: The platform should enforce role-based access control to ensure that users can only access the data and features that are necessary for their roles. This helps prevent unauthorized access to sensitive information and functionality.

Title: Secure File Storage
Creator Spotlight: Any files uploaded by users, such as music tracks or promotional materials, should be securely stored and protected against unauthorized access or tampering. Implementing file encryption and access controls can help achieve this.

Title: Secure Communication Channels
Creator Spotlight: All communication between users, including messages, notifications, and collaboration requests, should be encrypted and transmitted over secure channels to prevent eavesdropping and unauthorized interception of sensitive information.

Title: Protection against Malicious Content
Creator Spotlight: The platform should implement mechanisms to detect and prevent the upload or dissemination of malicious content, such as malware or phishing links. This includes regular scanning and monitoring of user-generated content.

Title: Audit Logging
Creator Spotlight: The platform should maintain detailed audit logs of user activities, including login attempts, data access, and modifications. These logs can be used for forensic analysis, troubleshooting, and detecting any suspicious or unauthorized activities.

Title: Fast Creator Profile Loading
Creator Spotlight: When viewing a creator's profile, the page should load within 2 seconds to provide a smooth user experience and minimize waiting time.

Title: Real-time Collaboration Updates
Creator Spotlight: When multiple creators are collaborating on a project, the system should update changes and contributions in real-time (within 1 second) to ensure efficient collaboration and avoid conflicts.

Title: Quick Search for Creators
Creator Spotlight: When searching for creators based on specific criteria (e.g., genre, location), search results should be displayed within 3 seconds, even during peak usage times.

Title: Efficient Media Upload
Creator Spotlight: When creators upload media files (e.g., audio, video), the system should process and store the files within 5 seconds to minimize waiting time and allow for smooth content production.

Title: Responsive Sponsorship Deal Sign-up
Creator Spotlight: When brands or record labels sign creators for sponsorship deals, the system should respond within 2 seconds to provide a seamless and efficient process.

Title: Scalable User Profile Storage
Creator Spotlight: As the number of creators and users on the platform grows, the system should be able to handle the increased storage requirements for user profiles, ensuring fast retrieval and updates.

Title: Efficient Search and Filtering
Creator Spotlight: As the number of creators and brands on the platform increases, the system should be able to efficiently search and filter through a large database of profiles, ensuring quick response times and accurate results.

Title: Horizontal Scalability for Increased Traffic
Creator Spotlight: As the platform gains popularity and attracts more users, the system should be able to horizontally scale by adding more servers or instances to handle the increased traffic and maintain optimal performance.

Title: Real-time Collaboration Scalability
Creator Spotlight: As the number of collaborations between creators and influencers grows, the system should be able to handle real-time interactions and updates, ensuring smooth collaboration experiences even with a large number of concurrent users.

Title: Scalable Content Delivery
Creator Spotlight: To ensure a seamless user experience, the system should integrate with content delivery networks (CDNs) to efficiently deliver media content, such as videos and images, to users regardless of their geographical location.

Title: Integration with Social Media Platforms
Creator Spotlight: The platform should integrate with popular social media platforms (e.g., Instagram, YouTube) to allow creators to easily share their content and reach a wider audience.

Title: Secure Authentication and Authorization
Creator Spotlight: The platform should integrate with industry-standard authentication and authorization protocols (e.g., OAuth, JWT) to ensure secure access to creator profiles and prevent unauthorized access.

Title: Real-time Notifications
Creator Spotlight: The platform should integrate with a notification service to provide real-time updates to creators regarding new collaboration opportunities, sponsorship deals, and profile interactions.

Title: Integration with Music Streaming Services
Creator Spotlight: The platform should integrate with popular music streaming services (e.g., Spotify, Apple Music) to allow creators to showcase their music and enable easy discovery by record labels and brands.

Title: Data Synchronization with Record Labels and Brands
Creator Spotlight: The platform should integrate with record labels and brands' systems to synchronize creator profiles, collaboration history, and sponsorship deals, ensuring accurate and up-to-date information.

Title: Enhanced Creator Profile
Creator Spotlight: The platform should provide a comprehensive and visually appealing creator profile page, showcasing their work, achievements, and social media presence.

Title: Easy Navigation
Creator Spotlight: The platform should have a clear and intuitive navigation system, allowing users to easily browse through different sections, such as creator profiles, collaboration opportunities, and sponsorship deals.

Title: Efficient Search and Filter Options
Creator Spotlight: Users should be able to quickly search for creators based on various criteria, such as genre, location, follower count, and engagement rate. The platform should also provide advanced filtering options to refine search results.

Title: Streamlined Collaboration Process
Creator Spotlight: The platform should facilitate smooth and efficient collaboration between creators and brands/record labels, providing clear communication channels, project management tools, and a streamlined workflow for content production.

Title: Responsive Design
Creator Spotlight: The platform should be responsive and optimized for different devices and screen sizes, ensuring a seamless user experience on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.

Title: High Availability for Creator Spotlight
Creator Spotlight: The platform should ensure high availability for the Creator Spotlight feature, with a target uptime of 99.99%, to provide consistent visibility and recognition for exceptional creators.

Title: Scalability for Increased Traffic
Creator Spotlight: The platform should be able to handle increased traffic and user activity during peak periods, such as when exceptional creators are being highlighted, without any degradation in performance or availability.

Title: Data Integrity for Creator Profiles
Creator Spotlight: The platform should ensure the integrity of creator profiles, including their biographical information, portfolio, and previous collaborations, to maintain trust and accuracy in the information presented to record labels and brands.

Title: Secure Sign-up and Authentication
Creator Spotlight: The platform should implement secure sign-up and authentication mechanisms, such as multi-factor authentication and encryption, to protect creator accounts and prevent unauthorized access.

Title: Backup and Recovery of Creator Data
Creator Spotlight: The platform should perform regular backups of creator data, including profiles and collaboration history, and have a robust recovery process in place to minimize data loss and ensure continuity in case of system failures or disasters.
